Text: I have downloaded this torrent twice now, and both programs I use to uncompress files are not working.  They both say that it is missing parts.  I use stuffit and zipeg on my mac.  Is there another program that may work better?  Or is anyone else having problems with this?
Thank you .. worked perfectly with me on my PC... :D

Hey nzvegan, I used SimplyRAR for Mac to unzip and it worked just fine, I have checked it and it works great.  Just wanted to pass that along if you are still having problems, it is a free download.  Anxious to watch this one, I love Winslet

The file hasn't been properly compressed, but SimplyRAR somehow manages to uncompress it, Stuffit kept asking for other pieces on the mac, frankly I dont understand why in 2011 we are still rar splitting, no need to do it, it causes unnecessary problems, dont mean to be unthankful, I really appreciate the time taken to upload and create these torrents but just thought I might mention this...

It unzipped fine with the free 7-zip.
http://www.7-zip.org/
